ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Items lost after account cancel?  Multi Users?
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They guarantee that your characters will still be there with all their gear for 3 months. However, in practice they have never yet actually wiped any
ygData.messageBody:
Techpriest wrote:
> I am back in school and working full time so I don't have time for
> all my hobbies. I was thinking of canceling my EQ account for the
> semester and picking it back up later. I am only 2 semester from
> graduation (then I will have a degree showing I can do what I have
> been doing for the past 8 years). How long after you cancel your
> account will your stuff get erased? I would hate to start back up
> later and find all my loot was gone.

They guarantee that your characters will still be there with all their
gear for 3 months. However, in practice they have never yet actually
wiped any characters over level one (I think they did a wipe of
unplayed level ones a couple of years ago, or intended to). I know
people who have cancelled their account and then returned 2-3 years
later and their characters are still their with all their gear.

> I did have another idea. Let a friend use the account and just tell
> him to stay off Tunare where my guys are. While not any cheaper it
> would help me with the "waste" aspect. What happens if he is in the
> game and I try and log in for a quick game? Will it give me an
> error, kick him out, suspend the account, alert the Sony SWAT team?

You would get an error message saying account was in use.

Matt
